EmailTemplate.name: Save-the-Date Clients
EmailTemplate.subject: Register for TriTech Software Systems' Pacific Northwest Tech Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TriTech
Pacific Northwest Tech Seminar Wednesday, February 15, 2012 l Issaquah, Washington
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, We hope that you will join us and fellow VisiCAD users at our Pacific Northwest Technology Seminar, where we will discuss the latest features of VisiCAD Version 5.0, Mobile software feature set, Virtualizing CAD and Remote Connectivity.
AGENDA:
9:00 AM - 9:15 AM Introductions and Announcements
9:15 AM - 10:45 AM Latest feature set of VisiCAD from Version 4.3 to 5.0
10:45 AM - 11:00 AM Break
11:00 AM - 12:30 PM Latest VisiNet Mobile software feature set
12:30 PM - 1:00 PM Break/Lunch (provided)
1:00 PM - 1:45 PM System Architecture Changes in VisiCAD 4.3 and 5.0
1:45 PM - 2:00 PM Break
2:00 PM - 2:30 PM Virtualizing CAD (VMware Options)
2:30 PM - 3:00 PM Remote Connectivity for CAD (Citrix vs. ClearCube)
Hope to see you there! Ken Schulte, Client Account Manager
EVENT DETAILS Don't want to miss this informative technology seminar? See details below and register today.
Date: Wednesday, February 15, 2012
Time: 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM
Location: Eastside Fire & Rescue Headquarters Station 175 Newport Way NW Issaquah, WA 98027
Cost: Free, includes Lunch
To Register, click here: http://offers.tritech.com/VNS_PacificNW_0212_Registration.html
Questions? Ken Schulte Client Account Manager 720.379.3900 ken.schulte@tritech.com
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
